output:
I tell you that I love you everyday
Words can't explain the journey my heart takes
Every beat that it makes is for you My eyes only see shades of blue
My lips only yearn for those fingertips Of the girl I listen to the radio with
While 3am blinks on the clock It's too early for goodnight
We'll keep the sun out of sight I haven't seen your smile for a while
My hand only means you're close to me With your fingers next to mine
I whisper sweet things, oh they'll never see What we have here
